description.value: As part of a short rest, you can harvest bone, hide, or other materials from a slain beast, construct, dragon, monstrosity, or plant creature of size Small or larger to create one of the following items: any simple melee weapon, a blowgun, 10 blowgun needles, 10 darts, a shield, leather armor, hide armor. To use this trait, you need a blade, such as a dagger, or appropriate artisan's tools, such as leatherworker's tools.
